channel.title: List all the CPU's & GPU's you've ever used/owned over time
channel.description:
GPU: (in order by the times you had it, not the performance of the card) Nvidia TNT2 (PCI) -> Nvidia MX400 (PCI) -> Nvidia FX5200 (PCI) -> Nvidia FX5500 (AGP) -> Nvidia 7300GS (AGP) -> Nvidia 8800GT (PCI-e) -> Nvidia 7600GS (PCI-e) -> Nvidia GTX260+ (PCI-e)
CPU: (name, ghz, cores) AMD Athlon (forgot model name exactly very old) x1 -> AMD Sempron 2400+ x1 -> AMD Athlon 4000+ x1 -> Intel E6850 x2 -> AMD Phenom II 945 X4
just got that gtx260+ today as well, gf got me it :D couldest stand that 7600gs any moar
oh and i was an nvidia fanboi up until the 8800gt

item.title: List all the CPU's & GPU's you've ever used/owned over time
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

I would go through the list, but I do not own a lot of my old computers and I when I had them I was dumb…

What I remember:
CPUS:
Pentium 2 (not sure of clock speed), Pentium 3 1Ghz, Pentium 4 3.06Ghz, Atom 1.6Ghz

GPUs:
old no brand > 16mb memory, Intel GMA 900, Radeon Xpress 200 IGP, Intel GMA 950.

like lawl, I dont upgrade often, I am Intel fanboy. I have this sub-concious hatred towards AMD.

@OP, your gf buys you computer shit???!?!?

Read full topic

item.title: List all the CPU's & GPU's you've ever used/owned over time
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

CPU: 190MHZ Pentium One, 700MHZ AMD Thunderbird, 700MHZ Pentium Three, Intel Celeron 800MHZ, Intel Celeron 2.2GHZ, Intel Celeron 2.5GHZ, 1.4GHZ Pentium M, AMD Athlon 3500+, AMD Athlon 5200+ X2

GFX: 2MB in first computer unknown brand, 16MB SiS in second computer, 4MB AGB2X in laptop, 64MB SiS in IBM, 256MB Intel in Mercury, 256MB SiS in Acer, 32MB ATi something in Laptop, 7300GS in Mercury, 8600GT in Mercury, X1900GT in Mercury + A stack of like 5 cards on my computer desk.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

CPU’s:

Pentium 66mhz > Pentium 2 233mhz > Pentium 3 400mhz > AMD Athlon XP 2000+ > AMD Athlon X2 4800+ > AMD Athlon X2 5000+ > AMD Phenom II x4 920

Gfx: Unknown 1mb card > Matrox G200 > Voodoo 2 dual cards > GeForce 4 mx 440 > Ati Radeon 9700 Pro > GeForce 5 5200 > Ati Radeon x1650 Pro > Ati Radeon 4850 (xfire) > Nvidia GeForce GTX 275 OC > (Future: Ati Radeon 5870 x2?)

item.title: List all the CPU's & GPU's you've ever used/owned over time
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I like this thread, neat idea.

desktops:
Pentium 486 66mhz > Intel Celeron 500mhz > AMD Athlon XP 2000+ > AMD Athlon XP 2500+ > Intel Core 2 duo 2.3ghz conroe core (older)

(starting with the AMD Athlon XP 2000+, first two were integrated, who knows?) Nvidia Riva TNT2 (AGP1X) > Nvidia FX 5200 (AGP8X) > Nvidia FX 5500 (AGP8X) > Nvidia 7600GT (PCI-E) > Nvidia 8800GT (PCI-E)

laptops:
AMD Athlon XP 3000+ 64bit > Intel Core2duo Tsomethingnotsogood (then it died, video card I think) > Intel Celeron 1600mhz

ATI Radeon 9600 integrated > Nvidia 8600GT integrated > SiS somethingthatsucks integrated

Read full topic
